author: mardovich
content: Hi, I'm a UX and Product designer, I'm focusing on rapid prototyping for startups, facilitation of design workshops for collaborative units, and token-driven design systems, I was working with UBS, Refinitiv, Chicago Mercantile Exchange and similar clients on dashboard-centric digital products for traders, FAs, decision makers of all sorts. I'm looking for a job in crypto-centric startups that require not only a stream of deliverables but also want to establish a good design culture from the start, I will reply with a CV/portfolio on demand.
